If you want to know why the hype for HL3 will never truly die, play this game and it's following two "episodes". Be warned, though. Episode 2 is arguably one of the best things Valve has ever published, but it promises a stunning finale that may never be realized. One day we will witness the unforseen consequences we've so long been preparing for. Until then, we have to make do with what we have.

Ora se non l'avete ancora provato non guardate Gameplay su YouTube e andate subito a giocarlo che intanto costa solo 10 ‚Ç¨ e con gli sconti arriva anche a meno di 1 ‚Ç¨, non fate il mio errore che tempo fa andai a vedere un gameplay su Half Life 2 spoilerandomi anche il finale, poi quando lo provai di mano mia ricordavo quasi niente del gioco, eccetto il finale, che quando lo vidi sul gameplay rimasi alibito, ma rovinai lo stupore di quel finale quando ci giocai.

Best game ever!!!!!

This is the best Valve game of all time, probably is my favourite game. The game cost me 1.99, on sale, the regular price is 9.99. It has beautiful views, places and every single detail is incredible for a 2004 game ... and how did they made those graphics in 2004 ?! It¬¥s just beautiful! The game had never crashed or bugged, it works very well in my laptop, and I don¬¥t have a Gaming PC. The action is very exciting, I was never bored playing this game. From rooftop chases and helicopter chases with a futuristic jetski and incredible and creative guns, Half-Life 2 will always be a great game.

Es dificil hacer un rese√±a de este juego sin emocionarme tanto, bueno, aunque este juego sea del 2004, tiene unos graficazos, que eso es de admirar ya que estamos en 2017 y los graficos no son malos, son EXCELENTES, pero eso no es todo, la jugabilidad es sencilla y facil de manejar, no como otros juegos, ademas que tiene una historia GRANDIOSA, y desarrollo de personajes es increible, en mas de una ocasion este juego me hizo llorar, facilmente este juego es mi favorito y uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, y si no lo tienes, pues compratelo, aunque no sea un juego nuevo, ya es bastante viejo, pero vale cada centavo, si quieres un buena experiencia, este es tu juego 11/10

PD: Tengo exactamente 3 copias de este juego

[h1]Half-Life 2 Brief Review[/h1]

To be written...


[b]Should you buy it now, wait for sale or never touch it? Buy it now![/b]
absolutly amazing

This review is based off the update mod:
Half-Life 2 is the iconic sequel to the critically acclaimed game of 1998 which one over 50 game of the year awards. Winner of 39 awards, Half-Life 2 continues Gordon Freeman's journey to undo the wrong he accidentally causes back in Black Mesa. Powered by the Source engine, this game took the series gameplay and storytelling to new heights. Featuring a much more intense storyline and new weapons and characters, Half-Life 2 set the boundaries for fps games and PC games. I wish there would be a new game, but I'm not gonna harass Valve to make the game whose number must not be said. It just adds more pressure to the developers of the series. Still, this is a good game and everyone should play it. It's a blast!
one of the best game in history
